PerfectNetExp.abs: 占据 - English translation - bab.la... ... 占据空间的 spatial 先占据 preoccupancy 抢先占据 to preoccupy.
preobrazhenskite 斜水硼镁石, preoccupancy 专心致志, preobrazhenskite 黄硼镁石

list.abs: prenuptial play 婚前调情preoccupation effect 先占效应preoviposition period 产卵前期
he rattled on about safety at his plants : an important subject , but hardly what one would expect to be his main preoccupation .他喋喋不休地说着他所在工厂的安全问题：虽是一个重要的议题，但没有人想到这会是他的主要关注点。

for long timers in any preoccupation or with any level of fame , the machinery is so extensive as each who acknowledges the profession or fame of the other adds machinery to the pool .很长时间来，在任何职业或任何水平的名望度中，机械性是如此广泛，因为每一个知道他人职业或名望的人会在池中增加机械性。

the result of a load of electrical sacred geometry that was deteriorating his form enough that he had to leave the preoccupation behind in order to ascend beyond 2000 strands .结果就是大量以太神圣几何形充分摧毁了他身体，以至于他不得不离开这份职业以超过2000股而提升。

means.word_mean: 1. the mental state of being preoccupied by something
2. the act of taking occupancy before someone else does
